articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Apple shelves Vision Pro overhaul to focus on AI glasses - TechCrunch
articles.description: Bloomberg reports that the tech giant is developing at least two types of smart glasses.
articles.content: Apple is sidelining plans to overhaul its Vision Pro VR glasses to focus on developing AI smart glasses that can compete with products from Meta, according to a new report from Bloomberg’s Mark Gurma… [+854 chars]
